Sentencas: Ni-LnO(x) cermets (Ln = La, Ce, Pr, Nd, Sm, Eu, Gd), in which LnO(x) is not an oxygen ion conductor, have shown high performance as the anodes for low-temperature solid oxide fuel cells (SOFCs) with doped ceria electrolytes.
Titulo: Ni-Sm2O3 cermet anodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells with stabilized zirconia electrolytes

Sentencas: In this work, Ni-Sm2O3 cermets are primarily investigated as the anodes for intermediate-temperature SOFCs with scandia stabilized zirconia (ScSZ) electrolytes.
Titulo: Ni-Sm2O3 cermet anodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells with stabilized zirconia electrolytes

Sentencas: The electrochemical performances of the Ni-Sm2O3 anodes are characterized using single cells with ScSZ electrolytes and LSM-YSB composite cathodes.
Titulo: Ni-Sm2O3 cermet anodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells with stabilized zirconia electrolytes

Sentencas: The Ni-Sm2O3 anodes exhibit relatively lower performance, compared with that reported Ni-SDC (samaria doped ceria) and Ni-YSZ (yttria stabilized zirconia) anodes, the state-of-the-art electrodes for SOFCs based on zirconia electrolytes.
Titulo: Ni-Sm2O3 cermet anodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells with stabilized zirconia electrolytes

Sentencas: The relatively low performance is possibly due to the solid-state reaction between Sm2O3 and ScSZ in fuel cell fabrication processes.
Titulo: Ni-Sm2O3 cermet anodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells with stabilized zirconia electrolytes

Sentencas: By depositing a thin interlayer between the Ni-Sm2O3 anode and the ScSZ electrolyte, the performance is substantially improved.
Titulo: Ni-Sm2O3 cermet anodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells with stabilized zirconia electrolytes

Sentencas: Single cells with a Ni-SDC interlayer show stable open circuit voltage, generate peak power density of 410 mW cm(-2) at 700 degrees C, and the interfacial polarization is about 0.7 Omega cm(2).
Titulo: Ni-Sm2O3 cermet anodes for intermediate-temperature solid oxide fuel cells with stabilized zirconia electrolytes
